interruptionHandling.description: Automatically stops TTS playback when user starts speaking

voiceActivityDetection.description: High sensitivity VAD for quick detection of user speech (target: 10ms detection time)

endpointing.description: Detects end of user speech within 800ms of silence

backgroundNoiseSuppression.description: Reduces background noise to improve VAD accuracy

interruptionBehavior.description: When interrupted, clear the audio buffer and process the new user input immediately rather than resuming previous speech
